name: Irodzuki Tincle no Koi no Balloon Trip
name_original: Irodzuki Tincle no Koi no Balloon Trip
description: Irozuki Tingle no Koi no Balloon Trip is an adventure video game developed by Vanpool and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS. It is a sequel to the game Freshly-Picked Tingle's Rosy Rupeeland and was released in Japan on August 6, 2009. As with its predecessor, the game focuses on Tingle, a character from The Legend of Zelda series.
